issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

I'm using version 1.6.1 of the Titanium Mobile API

When I use the following code for a textfield, the password the user is typing appears in the T9 suggestions in Android. I'm using Android 2.2 and 2.3.3 for my testing, but I'd assume this is happening on all versions.

var password = Titanium.UI.createTextField({

    id: 'password',
className:'textfields',
borderStyle:Titanium.UI.INPUT_BORDERSTYLE_ROUNDED,
autocorrect:false,
passwordMask:true,
keyboardType: Titanium.UI.KEYBOARD_DEFAULT,
returnKeyType: Titanium.UI.RETURNKEY_GO,
autocapitalization: Titanium.UI.TEXT_AUTOCAPITALIZATION_NONE,
enableReturnKey: true

});

{html}
fields.summary: T9 word hints appear on Android for password fields

comments.body:
{html}

I just found ticket 3331. This ticket is a duplicate of that, but may add a little bit of additional information.

{html}
